title: BitcoinGirl.Club
author: BitcoinGirl.Club
created_time: July 30, 2023, 08:36:03 PMLast edit: October 08, 2023, 06:39:05 AM by BitcoinGirl.Club
content: Many of you don't stake your PGP, I am sure a lot you don't even know how to do that and a lot of you is hearing the name for the first time. I need to have some fun.Â You need a merit or need to have just fun?I will award you one but you need to [1.] post your PGP key [2.] post an encrypted message for meI must be able to successfully decrypt it.Not more than one successful entry per member.Finger print: 50D9 7A35 B672 86DF B91D Â DF3D 63B1 52DE FEC7 283DQuote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on July 31, 2023, 09:48:43 PMCode:-----BEGIN PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK----------END PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----Warning: If anyone cheats please catch him, I will tag the account for abuse.Update:Pending merit list: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5461523.msg62960481#msg62960481

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on July 30, 2023, 08:36:03 PMYou need a merit or need to have just fun?Let us have fun.You want both? We should sign a message with bitcoin address and you want us to also send an encrypted message by using your PGP public key? Or only the second one which is PGP?

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: _act_ on July 30, 2023, 09:00:57 PMQuote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on July 30, 2023, 08:36:03 PMYou need a merit or need to have just fun?Let us have fun.You want both? We should sign a message with bitcoin address and you want us to also send an encrypted message by using your PGP public key? Or only the second one which is PGP?You can not encrypt a message using bitcoin signed message. You need PGP key. So the game is only for PGP key. You must add current date in the secret message you have for me and no one else should be able to read it except me [that's why it is encrypted]. I will post the decrypted message however If you feel uncomfortable then add it in your encrypted message, I will not post it to honour your request.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: This brings back memories when I participated in the same although I didn't join for merit/s but to have some experience/knowledge and having fun. So the goal is to encrypt a message that only you can decrypt and in order to do that js to use your pgp public key where you have the private one which is used to decrypt what's been encrypted using your public key. I am s little bit confused as to why there's a signed message in OP. Is it another task (fun/blast from the past) if I call it?.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on July 30, 2023, 09:26:49 PMYou can not encrypt a message using bitcoin signed message. You need PGP key. So the game is only for PGP key. You must add current date in the secret message you have for me and no one else should be able to read it except me [that's why it is encrypted]. I will post the decrypted message however If you feel uncomfortable then add it in your encrypted message, I will not post it to honour your request. Check your public key, probably missing a or some characters. In the link that you provided, I was able to use people's public key to encrypt message, but I was unable to use yours. Or try and encrypt a message with it to know if the public key is valid or not. If I am not right, let me know.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: Quote from: _act_ on July 30, 2023, 09:47:06 PMCheck your public key, probably missing a or some characters. In the link that you provided, I was able to use people's public key to encrypt message, but I was unable to use yours. Or try and encrypt a message with it to know if the public key is valid or not. If I am not right, let me know.I am wondering what you are using if it's the easy one like igolder when it was active or the one that mdayonliner translated to English. Well, I would prefer to use the easy one for a certain reason (quite sick a few days and just recovered) and I haven't looked for one that I can use easily just by pasting the public key of OP and encrypt whatever message I'd like to encrypt. If you know any feel free to share but if it is not allowed by BGC then it's fine by me.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Quote from: nakamura12 on July 30, 2023, 11:28:38 PMI am wondering what you are using if it's the easy one like igolder when it was active or the one that mdayonliner translated to English. Well, I would prefer to use the easy one for a certain reason (quite sick a few days and just recovered) and I haven't looked for one that I can use easily just by pasting the public key of OP and encrypt whatever message I'd like to encrypt. If you know any feel free to share but if it is not allowed by BGC then it's fine by me.The recommended one on this forum is Kleopatra which is a desktop app.You can use this guide to know more about it: [Eng: Tutorial] PGP Signature - Encrypt/Decrypt message - Fingerprint

comments.author: SeriouslyGiveaway
comments.body: Why do you need PGP? (Phil Zimmermann).A Tutorial for Beginners to PGP - Pretty Good Privacy (University of Pittsburgh at Johnstown).

Good job. When is the first encrypted message I am going to receive?

comments.author: satscraper

I got the following warning when has tried to encrypt Â message by using BitcoinGirl.Club's public key:The GPGME library returned an unexpected error at gpafileencryptop.c779. The error was : Unusable public key.Others public keys that I have are working like a charm.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: I am not sure if you will decrypt the encrypted message. Let me know if you are able to decrypt the message or not so that I can try to encrypt a message again. Well, here's what I encrypted and hope I did it correctly. I didn't use desktop for it because I don't want to make a mess in my room as I really need to be near the toilet most of the time because I am experiencing pain in my stomach and always makes me take a dump. I am not feeling well for the past few days and just got better (no more common cold).Code:-----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE-----Version: BCPG v1.-----END PGP MESSAGE-----

Maybe it's because it is not working for others?.Â  Anyways, it's not up to me so I am only asking why and also for my curiosity.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Surprise, no more members?I don't think anyone is denying the merit reward then why is not many people joining. Is it too hard to learn the skill for bitcointalk members? You need a good understanding of encryption and you need to use it regularly to protect your privacy. It's not something just about fun but it's necessary too.Reposted.

comments.author: Zenp

Please let me know if you can read it, it's my first ever PGP message to anyone.Code:-----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE----------END PGP MESSAGE-----If anyone wants to send me a message aswell, i would love it!

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: I totally forgot about this topic LOL@Zenp, I had to reset my windows a few days ago and all old setting are gone. I will need to install the tools to check your message. Once I get time to do that I will reply you. Can't wait to see what you wrote.Keep sending your encrypted messages.

comments.author: God Of Thunder
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on September 28, 2023, 02:30:31 PMKeep sending your encrypted messages.Hey there, BitcoinGirl.Club, I have been around for a while but have not learned anything about PGP yet. I have heard about PGP before, but I never tried to learn about it. It seems like the signature we generate from Bitcoin wallet software like Electrum. I followed his post. Quote from: SeriouslyGiveaway on July 31, 2023, 02:41:56 PMA Tutorial for Beginners to PGP - Pretty Good Privacy (University of Pittsburgh at Johnstown).But it seems the tutorial is outdated. From where can I download the PGP software and other tools (if required)? http://www.pgpi.didisoft.com/download/ Is it the official website of PGP that Phil Zimmerman developed? Or do we have multiple software? I don't want to rely on Google search results.
